tasks.title: Task Model with GORM
tasks.description: Define the Task model using GORM ORM for PostgreSQL. Fields: id (int, primary key, auto-increment), title (string, not null, max 100), description (string, nullable, max 500), completed (boolean, default false), created_at (timestamp, auto set), updated_at (timestamp, auto update). Add composite indexes on completed and created_at. Include JSON tags for API serialization.

tasks.title: GET /api/tasks Endpoint
tasks.description: Implement GET /api/tasks handler using gorilla/mux. Accept optional query params: filter (all|active|completed). Return JSON: {total:int, active:int, completed:int, tasks:[Task]}. Use GORM to query tasks, apply filter, and count totals. No auth required. Handle DB errors with 500 status.

tasks.title: POST /api/tasks Endpoint
tasks.description: Implement POST /api/tasks handler. Validate incoming JSON: title (required, ≤100 chars), description (optional, ≤500 chars), completed (optional bool, default false). Use go-playground/validator. Insert new Task via GORM, set created_at & updated_at. Return 201 + full Task JSON on success, 400 on validation failure, 500 on DB error.

tasks.title: PUT /api/tasks/:id Endpoint
tasks.description: Implement PUT /api/tasks/:id handler. Extract id param. Accept JSON body with optional fields: title, description, completed. Validate with go-playground/validator. Use GORM First to locate task, update provided fields, set updated_at. Return 200 + updated Task JSON, 404 if not found, 400 on validation error, 500 on DB error.

tasks.title: DELETE /api/tasks/:id Endpoint
tasks.description: Implement DELETE /api/tasks/:id handler. Extract id param. Use GORM Delete to remove Task by id. Return 200 + JSON {deleted_id:int, message:string} on success, 404 if not found, 500 on DB error.

tasks.title: PATCH /api/tasks/:id/toggle Endpoint
tasks.description: Implement PATCH /api/tasks/:id/toggle handler. Extract id param. Use GORM First to fetch task, invert completed boolean, set updated_at. Return 200 + updated Task JSON, 404 if not found, 500 on DB error.

tasks.title: TaskCard Component
tasks.description: React functional component TaskCard.tsx with TypeScript. Props: task{id,title,description,completed}, onToggle(), onDelete(), onUpdate(). Display glassmorphic card using Tailwind with soft shadows & lg border-radius. Show checkbox, title (strikethrough when completed), truncated description, edit & delete icons. Use Framer Motion for subtle hover lift. Emit events on user actions.

tasks.title: TaskInput Component
tasks.description: React functional component TaskInput.tsx with TypeScript. Props: onSubmit({title,description}), loading. Render glassmorphic form with Inter font, primary color accents. Controlled inputs: title (required, max 100), description (optional, max 500). Show loading spinner on submit button when loading=true. Use axios to POST /api/tasks. Clear form after successful submit.

tasks.title: FilterButtons Component
tasks.description: React functional component FilterButtons.tsx with TypeScript. Props: currentFilter ('all'|'active'|'completed'), onFilterChange(filter), taskCounts{all,active,completed}. Render three glassmorphic buttons with soft shadows, active state highlighted with primary color. Display count badges on each button. Use Framer Motion for subtle tap animation.

tasks.title: TaskStats Component
tasks.description: React functional component TaskStats.tsx with TypeScript. Props: totalTasks, completedTasks, activeTasks. Render glassmorphic card showing circular progress bar (completed/total) using accent color, plus three labeled stats with Inter font. Animate numbers with Framer Motion on change.

tasks.title: EmptyState Component
tasks.description: React functional component EmptyState.tsx with TypeScript. Props: onAddTask(). Centered glassmorphic card with large icon (lucide-react), welcoming message, and prominent CTA button using primary color. Button triggers onAddTask to focus TaskInput.

tasks.title: Task Dashboard Page
tasks.description: React page component TaskDashboard.tsx. Sections: Hero with app title, TaskInput, FilterButtons, TaskList (map TaskCard), TaskStats, EmptyState when tasks empty. Use React Context for global task state. Fetch tasks via axios GET /api/tasks on mount and after mutations. Implement filter logic locally. Handle loading & error states. Responsive container layout with Tailwind, soft animations via Framer Motion.

tasks.title: About Page
tasks.description: React page component About.tsx. Sections: App overview with glassmorphic hero, Key features showcase with icons (lucide-react), How it works steps, Contact information with mailto link. Use Inter font, Tailwind layout, moderate Framer Motion scroll animations. Responsive design, max-width container.

tasks.title: App.jsx Main Entry
tasks.description: React App.jsx with React Router v6. Define routes: '/' -> TaskDashboard, '/about' -> About. Include top header navigation (glassmorphic, horizontal) with logo, nav links (Dashboard, About), theme toggle (dark/light) using Tailwind darkMode class. Provide system-wide context: frontend pages {TaskDashboard/,About/}, backend endpoints {GET,POST,PUT,DELETE,PATCH /api/tasks}, database model {Task}. Wrap with ThemeProvider context. Use Framer Motion page transitions.
